The apothecary skillfully combines materials into unguents and medicines using crushed herbs, curative minerals, and potent extracts. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 13 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8 [Apothecary](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3479) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 60 **Perception** +5 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) +5, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) +10, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43) +8 **Str** +0 **Dex** +1 **Con** +1 **Int** +3 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +1 **Medical Specialist** For encounters involving making medicine or alchemical contests, the apothecary is a 3rd-level challenge.
**Medical Wisdom** The apothecary can identify the effect of any alchemical composition or medical ingredient using only their senses. This typically takes 1 minute. **Items** [lesser acid flask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=74) (2), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [minor elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) (2), [Healer's Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2727), leather apron (functions as [padded armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=40)), mortar and pestle --- **AC** 14 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +3 **Will** +5 +1 circumstance to all saves vs. [poisons](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) **HP** 8 **Resistances** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 2 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** stone pestle +4, **Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning **Melee** fist +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)), **Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning **Ranged** acid flask +5 ([range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [Splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150)), **Damage** 1 acid plus 1d6 [persistent acid](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and 1 [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=699) acid
